name: Toxic Monsters
description:
What is Toxic Monsters?

Toxic Monsters combines fast paced arcade action with a sporty twist.

In the not so distant future, war brings civilization to its knees, and the beasts that hunt the remaining survivors become the worlds most popular sport.

You play as one of these survivors.
Kill the monsters, Collect their eggs, and feed them to the beast!

Key features

  • Fast paced, Casual, score-attack style game play.
  • Three unique classes of mount, each class has some unique characteristics when it comes to movement.
  • Single player and local multiplayer.
